attributes.action: David Beckham to play Football in the Olympics!
attributes.additional_details: It is a disgrace that David Beckham has not been selected for the GB Olympic Football Team. He has been an ambassador for the Olympics and this country over the years and the country has betrayed him! Micah Richards (no offence Micah/Micah Fans) will not bring the same influence on the younger players like Beckham would. LETS GET HIM IN!
